work_experience.job_description: Simply Insured, San Francisco June 2015, October 2015, , Senior Software Engineer, Automated some of the sales and support processes, saving 10% of the man hours spent per customer, Created Some marketing as well new business development tech,   Managed some of the infrastructure and deployment, including creating the companies staging servers and system

Financial Times, - New York City Feb 2011, August 2012 , Associate Product Manager, Conceived, investigated, prototyped, structured, and lead initial implementation of a project that will save $1m over, the next 10 years and increase site wide traffic 2%, Planned various API integrations with US based companies,    Lead a social initiative that to date has added over 1.4m social connections in 12 months (a 400% increase) by   working with social networking companies and internal technical staff to discover optimizations that were possible   Lead a redesign of portions of FT.com working across multiple teams to gather requirements, schedule work, and   inform stakeholders of expectations, including informing all parties of contingency plans   Launched "FT-Live" which brought the FT conferences team up to modern standards, by adding assets such as live   streaming, conference community information, and the addition of a cross conference identity on the website

Maker Media, San Francisco September 2014, April 2015, , Swiss Army Knife Engineer, Coded initial implementation of a social network for makers (makerspace.com) building search and backend, Led the implementation of a BI system,   Wrote Javascript, PHP, and Ruby on Rails code and managed their deployment

Generator Lab, San Francisco August 2012, July 2014, , Technical Co-Founder / Engineer, Conceived and developed a product to help recruiters identify their candidates and leads which are looking for jobs, based upon social networking activity, Managed product development as well as technical resource planning,    Managed the developer operations.    Planned and Implemented a profile search and information lookup API     Created a Search Engine for social profiles (NeedleHunt.com) with over a billion profiles on ElasticSearch    Coded the Crawlers/Algorithms/Ranking/Storage of Big Data + Performed General Data Scientist duties

Google -, , Mountain View June 2010, August 2010, , B.O.L.D. Intern, Consumer Operations, Audited the communication and flows within our abuse flagging system and made recommendations, Spotted errors and submitted fixes within python abuse decision scripts protecting one billion users,   Created new program with Google.org to leverage skills of outgoing interns for projects
